opendial.domains.rules

Class RuleOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.domains.rules.RuleCase
      • opendial.domains.rules.RuleOutput

  • public class RuleOutput
extends RuleCase
    Representation of a particular output derived from the application of a probabilistic rule. The output essentially contains a (parametrised) distribution over possible effects. If the rule contains multiple groundings, the output is a merge (joint probability distribution for a probability rule, additive table for a utility rule) of the rule case for every possible groundings.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-13 21:38:32 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Method Detail

      • addCase

        public void addCase(RuleCase newCase)
        Adds a rule case to the output. The result is a joint probability distribution in the case of a probability rule, and an additive table in the case of a utility rule.
        Parameters:
        newCase - the new rule case to add

      • getTotalMass

        public double getTotalMass(Assignment input)
                    throws DialException
        Returns the total probability mass specified by the output (possibly given an assignment of parameter values).
        Parameters:
        input - input assignment (with parameters values)
        Returns:
        the corresponding mass
        Throws:
        DialException
